<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_hub_flow"> <sys_hub_flow action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <acls/> <active>false</active> <annotation/> <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>Detects the language of text using Google Cloud Translator Service.</p>
<p><b>Inputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Text</strong> - Text to identify the language.</li> </ul>
<p><b>Outputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Detected Language</strong> - A JSON string containing information about the code and confidence of detected language.</li> <ul> <li><strong>Code</strong> - Language code of the detected language, as specified by Google Cloud Translator Service. </li> <li><strong>Confidence</strong> -A float value indicating the confidence in the result. The value is between zero and one and a low value indicates a low confidence. </li>
<br/> Sample Detected Language response for French text with confidence of 0.93 <br/> { <br/> 'code' : 'fr', <br/> 'confidence' : '0.93' <br/> } </ul> <li><strong>Alternatives</strong> - JSON string containing an array of other possible languages. Each element of the array is a JSON object containing a possible language code and confidence. <ul> <br/> Sample Alternatives response, if German and English are the possible alternatives <br/> [
<br/> { 'code' : 'de' , 'confidence' : '0.42' } , <br/> { 'code' : 'en' , 'confidence' : '0.36' } <br/> ] </ul> </li> <li><strong>Status</strong> - 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs.</li> <li><strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li> <li><strong>Error Code</strong> - Code for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li> </ul>
<p><b>Error Codes - Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>40052 - Text ('text' field) has exceeded its maximum length.</li> <li>40055 - Request is not authorised because credentials are missing or invalid.</li> <li>40050 - Error code to populate error messages from Google Cloud Translator instead of standardised error messages.</li> <li>40051 - Unknown error occurred.</li> </ul>
<p>To use this subflow, a corresponding Google Cloud Translator Service connection and credential must be created and associated with the Google Cloud Translation Connection & Credential alias. <a target="_blank" href="/api/now/v1/context_doc_url/Google_Cloud_Translator_Service_Spoke">Learn More</a></p> </description> <internal_name>detect_language</internal_name> <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>Detects the language of text using Google Cloud Translator Service.</p>
<p><b>Inputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Text</strong> - Text to identify the language.</li> </ul>
<p><b>Outputs:</b></p> <ul> <li><strong>Detected Language</strong> - A JSON string containing information about the code and confidence of detected language.</li> <ul> <li><strong>Code</strong> - Language code of the detected language, as specified by Google Cloud Azure Translator Service. </li> <li><strong>Confidence</strong> -A float value indicating the confidence in the result. The value is between zero and one and a low value indicates a low confidence. </li>
<br/> Sample Detected Language response for French text with confidence of 0.93 <br/> { <br/> 'code' : 'fr', <br/> 'confidence' : '0.93' <br/> } </ul> <li><strong>Status</strong> - 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs.</li> <li><strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li> <li><strong>Error Code</strong> - Code for error. Populated only when an error occurs.</li> </ul>
<p><b>Error Codes - Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>40052 - Text ('text' field) has exceeded its maximum length.</li> <li>40055 - Request is not authorised because credentials are missing or invalid.</li> <li>40050 - Error code to populate error messages from Google Cloud Translator instead of standardised error messages.</li> <li>40051 - Unknown error occurred.</li> </ul>
<p>To use this action, a corresponding Google Cloud Translator Service connection and credential must be created and associated with the Google Cloud Translation Connection & Credential alias. <a target="_blank" href="/api/now/v1/context_doc_url/Google_Cloud_Translator_Service_Spoke">Learn More</a></p> </description> <internal_name>detect_language</internal_name>
